full_description:
Xiaomi Wanbo X5 1100 Lumens Smart Android Portable LED Projector

The Xiaomi Wanbo X5 is a portable smart Android LED projector that promises to provide smooth connectivity and stunning images. The Xiaomi Wanbo X5 Smart Portable Projector, which makes use of LCD projection technology and a strong LED light source, provides a sharp physical resolution of 1920x1080 and an amazing brightness of 1100 lumens, guaranteeing clear and vibrant images. It offers flexibility for different viewing conditions with a suggested projection size ranging from 40 to 120 inches and a suggested distance of 1.3 to 4 meters. With a throw ratio of 1.5:1, the Xiaomi Wanbo X5 Smart Portable Projector offers complete auto-keystone correction and auto-focus functions for a simple setup and the best possible image quality. It supports aspect ratios of 16:9 and 4:3, thus it can be used for front, back, or rear ceiling projection, depending on the preferences of the user for different content. Running on the Android 9.0 operating system, it has 16GB of internal storage and 1GB of RAM, ensuring fluid performance and enough of room for apps and media. The Xiaomi Wanbo X5 Smart Portable Projector provides easy wireless access to web content and connection with external devices thanks to its dual-band Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.0 compatibility. It also has a strong integrated speaker system with 5W of audio output, two USB 2.0 ports, an HDMI input, a headphone connector, and an AV IN, offering a variety of connectivity choices for different multimedia devices.

cat_seo_title: Xiaomi Projector Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Xiaomi Projector at the best price in Bangladesh. Latest Xiaomi MI Compact Portable Projector available at Star Tech Shop. Order online & get delivery anywhere in BD.
full_description:
Xiaomi Mi Smart Projector 2 Portable Android Smart Laser Projector (Global version)

The Xiaomi Mi Smart Projector 2 is a compact projector from Xiaomi. It offers excellent image quality with FHD 1080p resolution, multi-angle keystone correction, and the inclusion of Android TV. It delivers high-quality images and sharp details. It comes with a brightness of up to 500 ANSI lumens and the use of diffuse reflection. The Mi Smart Projector 2 features automatic multi-angle keystone correction across 3 axes and 6 directions to provide a perfect rectangle, so you don't have to spend long minutes manually correcting it. The Smart Projector 2 comes equipped with a 3.5mm audio jack, a USB 2.0 port and an HDMI 2.0 port, the latter with 4K video input.

Voice control with Google Assistant

The Xiaomi Mi Smart Projector 2 integrates Google Assistant to make everything much easier for you. Simply press the Assistant button on the remote control to get started. You can use your voice to search for that movie title you want to watch, operate your Xiaomi projector, or control other compatible Smart Home devices.

4-channel LED projection and HDR10 decoding

The Xiaomi Mi Smart Projector 2 supports HDR10 decoding. By adding a blue light channel, the Rec.709 colour gamut of the Xiaomi Mi Smart Projector 2 exceeds 154%, which translates into much more vivid and lifelike colours compared to 3-channel LED projections.

Surround audio with large sound cavity

The Mi Smart Projector 2 adopts a large sound cavity built into the structure, as well as an ultra-long sound conduction tube, to deliver nuanced and clear audio with a frequency that can reach up to 90 Hz. Connect your Mi Smart Projector 2 to a phone or tablet via Bluetooth to even turn it into your new portable speaker. The amplifier also supports dual-channel digital surround sound and is compatible with Dolby Audio technology.

The Xiaomi Mi Smart Projector 2 comes with no warranty.

It also has a wide color gamut, which allows it to display a wide range of colors for more lifelike and accurate images. Additionally, it uses a laser light source, which provides a long lifespan and consistent brightness over time. The projector also has a built-in speaker and supports multiple wireless and wired connectivity options, making it easy to connect to a variety of devices. Overall, it's a great option for anyone looking for a high-quality projector for home entertainment.

Ultra short throw design

The TV cabinet's massive screen manufacturer. 0.23: 1 big depth of field ultra-short focal lens design, used on television A cabinet 24 centimeters from the wall may project 100 inches. The big picture. You won't have to worry about lifting or wiring, and they won't take up any inside room.

4K display

100-inch big screen with four times the ultra-clear 4K resolution of 1080P. The bright and clear image is still visible underneath the frame. The image performance is clearer and brighter, the details are rich and lifelike, and the degree of reproduction is higher thanks to Texas Instruments (TI) unique DLP digital light processing technology.

Brightness and Color

One of the standout features of the Fengmi Cinema 2 is its brightness of 2200 lumens. This allows it to project clear, bright images even in well-lit rooms, making it an ideal choice for daytime or ambient light use. Additionally, it has a wide color gamut, which enables it to display a wide range of colors for more lifelike and accurate images.

Laser Light Source

The Fengmi Cinema 2 uses a laser light source, which provides a long lifespan of up to 25,000 hours. The laser light source also ensures consistent brightness over time, so you can enjoy the same high-quality images for years to come.

Built-in Speaker and Connectivity

The Fengmi Cinema 2 has a built-in speaker, which eliminates the need for an additional audio system. It also supports multiple wireless and wired connectivity options, including HDMI, USB, and Bluetooth, making it easy to connect to a variety of devices such as streaming sticks, gaming consoles, and smartphones.
